text: I know immediately from experience that my best bet will be speaking to the bartender.
Unlike their transient customers, bartenders work regular shifts and any mixologist worth their money would pay careful attention to their patrons to avoid any funny business.
I stroll up to the bar.
The bartender is occupied serving drinks to the other aliens, but narrows his eye at me as I approach.
I can't help but be impressed at the skillful shake of the wrists of the bartender as he mixes multiple cocktails at a time, and serves them in quick succession.
...For the last time sir, I can't serve you any drinks if you can't show me an ID.
speaker: bartender

text: ...Also if you're trying to disguise yourself by putting on a new hat, I'm afraid it's not working.
speaker: bartender

text: I'm Private Investigator Dick Johnson.
I have some questions and by the looks of it, you can provide answers.
speaker: det

text: I flash the bartender my ID and slide over a business card for good measure.
He squints at me, but I can sense that my greeting has him caught off guard.
Oh I am very amazed...
speaker: bartender

text: Did you change personalities when you took off that cowboy hat?
It's almost like you're a different person.
speaker: bartender

text: Cowboy hat?! I would never!
speaker: det

text: ... But anyway, that's besides the point-
speaker: det

text: This cowboy detective...
could you describe in detail the circumstances when you last saw them?
They may be impersonating me.
speaker: det

text: Well if they are, just last night, your lookalike came in here trying to solve some kind of case, he said.
speaker: bartender

text: But it was strange.
speaker: bartender

text: If I recall, he asked for a drink and when I said I didn't serve without ID, he threw a tantrum and left.
speaker: bartender

text: Then after some time passed he came back with a cake box and went over to the stage and talked to the lady performing.
Left a half hour later.
speaker: bartender

text: I seeâ€¦ thank you for your time.
I appreciate the cooperation.
speaker: det

text: No problem.
speaker: bartender
